mapper.insert: insert into assess_report (id,applicationNum, serviceSource, checker, assessOrg, branchOffice, upFileURI,reportType,wordUri,pdfUri) VALUES (#{id},#{applicationNum},#{serviceSource}, #{checker}, #{assessOrg}, #{branchOffice}, #{upFileURI},#{reportType},#{wordUri},#{pdfUri});
mapper.update: UPDATE assess_report SET applicationNum=#{applicationNum}, serviceSource=#{serviceSource}, checker=#{checker},assessOrg=#{assessOrg}, branchOffice=#{branchOffice}, upFileUri=#{upFileURI},wordUri=#{wordUri},pdfUri=#{pdfUri} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, applicationNum, serviceSource, checker, assessOrg, branchOffice, upFileUri,wordUri,pdfUri,reportType FROM assess_report where id=#{id}
